meanings.definition: Extreme greed for wealth or material gain.
meanings.sent1: His avariciousness knew no bounds as he hoarded every penny he earned.
meanings.sent2: Her avariciousness led her to constantly seek ways to increase her fortune.
meanings.sent3: The avariciousness of the squirrel became evident when it tried to steal all the nuts in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The avariciousness of the corporation was likened to a black hole, consuming everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The avariciousness of the dragon was so intense that it guarded its treasure with fierce determination.

meanings.sent1: The avariciousness of his actions was evident in the way he always put his own interests first.
meanings.sent2: She displayed a certain avariciousness in her constant pursuit of material possessions.
meanings.sent3: The avariciousness of the cat was amusing to watch as it tried to claim all the toys as its own.
meanings.sent4: Her avariciousness shone through like a bright light in a room full of darkness.
meanings.sent5: The avariciousness of the politician was so transparent that even a child could see through it.
